description: Try this frozen yoghurt slice with blueberry and almonds for a healthier afternoon treat. It's the perfect summer dessert recipe.
keywords: Pudding,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Blueberry,Gluten free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Summer,Quick & easy dessert,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Jan Feb 2021,Peanut free
name: Blueberry & Almond Frozen Yoghurt Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Grease a 20 x 30cm lamington pan. Line base and sides with baking paper, extending paper 3cm above edges. Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Place blueberries on baking tray and bake for 10 minutes or until just starting to soften. Stand to cool.

Combine yoghurt, honey and vanilla in a large bowl, then pour into pan. Dollop over spoonfuls of blueberries. Gently shake pan to smooth top, then freeze for 5 hours or until frozen. Stand at room temperature for 10 minutes, then slice and serve topped with almonds.
